name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Once Photos Bypass for Whatsapp Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open view once midia in the browser.
short.pt_BR: Abra mídias de visualização única no navegador.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension elevates your WhatsApp Web experience by bypassing the “View Once” restriction, allowing you to view, save, and manage time-sensitive media on your terms. Whether it’s reviewing key documents or keeping personal memories safe, this tool ensures complete control over your media.

Key Features:
Unlimited Views for "View Once" Media: View any "View Once" images or videos without restrictions, even after the first view.

Media Downloading & Cloud Backup Integration: Download "View Once" media directly to your device or save it to Google Drive, Dropbox, or OneDrive for secure storage and easy access on other devices.

Automatic Activation for All Incoming Media: All "View Once" media sent after installation will be unlocked immediately without extra steps.

Batch Unlock Old Media: Save time by unlocking all old “View Once” media in bulk. No need to log out and scan QR codes multiple times.

Media Recovery Tool: Accidentally deleted a downloaded file? Use the built-in recovery tool to restore recently unlocked media.

Preview Mode: Instantly preview any “View Once” content in a dedicated gallery view before deciding whether to save or download it.

Advanced Search & Sort: Easily locate unlocked media with filters by sender, date, media type, or chat thread. Organize your media more efficiently.

Auto-Save Option: Enable auto-save to automatically store all “View Once” images and videos to a designated folder for hassle-free access.

Anti-Delete Protection: If a sender deletes a message with “View Once” content, the extension preserves your access, ensuring you never lose media.

Custom Notifications: Receive personalized alerts when “View Once” media is received, with the option to auto-open it in a new tab or download it instantly.

Password-Protected Media Vault: Secure sensitive media with a password-protected vault embedded within the extension for safe and private viewing.

Privacy Mode: Hide unlocked media from appearing in your regular WhatsApp Web view, with a “Private Media” section accessible only through the extension.

Media Analytics Dashboard: Get insights with an analytics dashboard that shows trends in media sent by contacts, total “View Once” media unlocked, and more.

Device Sync: Sync your unlocked media and extension settings across multiple devices and browsers for consistent access wherever you log in.

Dark Mode Support: Seamless integration with WhatsApp Web’s dark mode, ensuring a consistent and sleek look.

Stealth Mode: Keep the extension completely hidden from the sender’s view, preventing them from knowing that you’ve unlocked their “View Once” media multiple times.
